接口的使用
org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.fs.Writer

    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.fs中Writer的使用

      实现Writer的org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.fs中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AvroKeyValueSinkWriter<K,V>
      Implementation of AvroKeyValue writer that can be used in Sink.
      class  SequenceFileWriter<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      A Writer that writes the bucket files as Hadoop SequenceFiles.
      class  StreamWriterBase<T>
      Base class for Writers that write to a FSDataOutputStream.
      class  StringWriter<T>
      A Writer that uses toString() on the input elements and writes them to the output bucket file separated by newline.
